pros: Hilltop is a wonderful place to work. There is a good work-life balance, and lot of institutional knowledge, as most employees stay for a long time. Currently, we work in a hybrid environment, which provides the best of both worlds. Great benefits and competitive salaries. You won't be dissapointed.
cons: None that I can think of at the moment, other than positions are very competitive, as we have a lot of applicants for a limited number of positions.

job_title: Senior Policy Specialist in Baltimore, MD

pros: Great mission; wonderful colleagues; good benefits, including generous vacation time and tuition remission; competitive salaries; room for career growth; and great work/life balance.
cons: As with any job, it can be fast paced during the busy season, however, it's hands down the best job I have ever had.

pros: Located at UMBC, south side of Baltimore & convenient to DC.  For the most part, good people and interesting work.
